summary: This is a brief email from November 30, 2018, asking for clarification about an upcoming December 4 trial, specifically whether it is against the DOJ or against Jeffrey Epstein, and whether it is in state or federal court. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings involving Epstein around that time.

events.title: Upcoming Trial Mentioned
events.description: An email inquires about a trial scheduled for December 4, questioning whether it is against the Department of Justice or against Jeffrey Epstein, and whether it is in state or federal court.

keyFacts: An email dated November 30, 2018, references an upcoming trial on December 4, 2018.
The sender is seeking clarification on whether the trial is against the DOJ or against Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender also asks whether the trial is in state or federal court, indicating confusion or need for specifics about the legal proceeding.
